item.title: Leo Molloy's bar blasts PM in now-deleted Facebook post
item.description:
A social media post from a high-profile Auckland bar has taken aim at Prime Minister Jacinda Ardern following her announcement that bars would not be able to open for a week after level 2 came into force.

item.title: Second major bank ditches cheques
item.description:
A second major bank has announced it will ditch cheques.
The BNZ will phase out cheques by July 2021, following on the move by Kiwibank which stopped accepting cheques at the end of February this year.
